verses.verse: Maschil of David, when he was in the cave; a Prayer. I cry <WH6963> with my voice <WH6963> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; With my voice <WH6963> unto Jehovah <WH3068> do I make supplication <WH2603>.
I pour out <WH8210> my complaint <WH7879> before <WH6440> him <WH5046>; I show before <WH6440> him my trouble <WH6869>.

When my spirit <WH7307> was overwhelmed <WH5848> within me <WH3045>, Thou knewest my path <WH5410>. In the way <WH734> wherein <WH2098> I walk <WH1980> Have they hidden <WH2934> a snare for me <WH6341>.
Look <WH5027> on my right hand <WH3225>, and see <WH7200>; For there is no man that knoweth <WH5234> me <WH4498>: Refuge hath failed <WH6> me <WH1875>; No man careth for my soul <WH5315>.
I cried <WH2199> unto thee <WH3068>, O Jehovah; I said <WH559>, Thou art my refuge <WH4268>, My portion <WH2506> in the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>.
Attend <WH7181> unto my cry <WH7440>; For I am brought <WH1809> very <WH3966> low <WH1809>: Deliver <WH5337> me from my persecutors <WH7291>; For they are stronger than I <WH553>.

Bring <WH3318> my soul <WH5315> out of prison <WH4525>, That I may give thanks <WH3034> unto thy name <WH8034>: The righteous <WH6662> shall compass me about <WH3803>; For thou wilt deal bountifully with me <WH1580>.
